scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a humble stable setting under a thatched roof. On the right, the Virgin Mary, cloaked in blue, cradles the Christ Child. To her left, a woman in a red dress spins thread, while another woman in a pink gown holds a baby. In the foreground, an elderly man with a white beard toils in the earth, using an axe, with another axe lying nearby. The background features a wooden fence and a blue sky with scattered clouds.
